name: places/ChIJiVDfPmhS3YkR5XJqjitdr2I
adrFormatAddress: 1080 5th Ave #1a, New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text: I have suffered from Diabetes since 1971 and Dr. Messer has treated me for almost the past ten years. She is amazing, considerate, thoughtful and brilliant in helping me deal with my life long illness. I trust her as much or more than any physician who has treated me throughout my seventy years.

text.text: I have suffered from Diabetes since 1971 and Dr. Messer has treated me for almost the past ten years. She is amazing, considerate, thoughtful and brilliant in helping me deal with my life long illness. I trust her as much or more than any physician who has treated me throughout my seventy years.

originalText.text: I’ve seen Dr. Messer twice and she’s changed my life both times. The first time she suggested a helpful surgery - one no one else had mentioned to me and then she recommended an incredible surgeon who did an amazing job. Even though I’d only seen her once she called me after my surgery to check up on me. She answers questions thoroughly and is incredibly helpful and caring. I can’t recommend her enough.

text.text: I’ve seen Dr. Messer twice and she’s changed my life both times. The first time she suggested a helpful surgery - one no one else had mentioned to me and then she recommended an incredible surgeon who did an amazing job. Even though I’d only seen her once she called me after my surgery to check up on me. She answers questions thoroughly and is incredibly helpful and caring. I can’t recommend her enough.

originalText.text: I have been seeing Dr. Messer for nearly two years to treat my thyroid disease.  She always takes the time to listen to all my symptoms, to help make sense of them, and to track my progress between each appointment.  It's a very human interaction - which is more and more rare these days.  Her nurses are very competent.  And most importantly, I feel 100% better.

text.text: I have been seeing Dr. Messer for nearly two years to treat my thyroid disease.  She always takes the time to listen to all my symptoms, to help make sense of them, and to track my progress between each appointment.  It's a very human interaction - which is more and more rare these days.  Her nurses are very competent.  And most importantly, I feel 100% better.

originalText.text:
An appointment with Dr. Messer feels like a meeting with a favorite friend who also happens to be an excellent doctor. From the moment you step off 5th Avenue into her offices, you will be met with the highest professionalism and courteousness. From the front desk staff, to the nurses, and of course with Dr. Messer, you will feel cared for from beginning to end and everything in between.

Having grown frustrated from a previous lack of answers, I came to Dr. Messer for a second opinion hoping that she could get to the bottom of my issues. Thankfully she was able to investigate and diagnose my condition and put me on the path to optimal health.

Dr. Messer’s genuine care for her patients' health and well-being is evident in every interaction. Professional, friendly, and brilliant, you couldn’t be in more capable or compassionate hands.

originalText.text: Dr Weinstein is a consummate professional and outstanding physician. She is thoughtful and attentive and provides outstanding medical advice and customer service. I would wholeheartedly recommend Well by Messer to anyone.
